Body:
"""
        Test that the right errors are raised when invalid cipher modes are
        used with symmetric encryption.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = (enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.AES,
    b'\x00\x01\x02\x03\x04\x05\x06\x07\x08\t\n\x0b\x0c\r\x0e\x0f',
    b'\x0f\x0e\r\x0c\x0b\n\t\x08\x07\x06\x05\x04\x03\x02\x01\x00')
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField, 'Cipher mode is required.',
    engine.encrypt, *args)
kwargs = {'cipher_mode': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    "Cipher mode 'invalid' is not a supported mode.", engine.encrypt, *args,
    **kwargs)
